translation: Permeating the earth, I support all beings with My energy; and having become the watery moon, I nourish all herbs.
commentary: 15.13 village the earth? permeating invention? f and? Bhootani all beings? I hold support? I'm I? Ojasa by (My) energy? I nourish (I) nourish? f and? Herbs: the herbs? All of them all? Soma: moon? becoming having become juicy watery.Commentary The immanence of the Lord as the allsustaining life is described in this verse.Ojas The energy of the Lord (Isvara). The vast heavens and earth are firmly held by this energy.
